name: Toaster Factory
description:
You are a toaster. No. Not just a toaster. THE Toaster. The only toaster that has a purpose. Is that purpose to escape? Is it to find his meaning in life? or is it just to toast bread? Play the 6 most challenging levels ever in this BETA release to find out! 

WARNING: This game contains rapidly flashing colors, if you are prone to seizures please subside from playing.

Game Trailer

So, will there be more content?

Oh...Don't you worry there is more on the way. Updates will be frequent as the development process continues. :)
